Skip the queue and satisfy your cravings when you order ahead with Self Collect!
Find your preferred KFC Store, place your order, and head on over to pick up your freshly prepared meal.
Download or update your app now for more finger lickin' goodness!

Enjoy your favourite combo meals from as low as RM7.90! Just order via Self Collect, skip the queue, and enjoy finger lickin’ good food when you want it. Promotion is valid till 4th May 2019, so download or update your app today!

Enjoy your favourite combo meals from as low as RM7.90 when you order via Self Collect! It’s fast and easy - just place your order online, select your collection time, and skip the queue to get your meal. Promotion is only valid till 4th May 2019, so download or update your app now!

Rasa-Rasa Nikmat Puasa
Buka puasa this Ramadan with finger lickin' good deals at KFC. Order with KFC Delivery or Self Collect to enjoy RM15 off your next order. Download or update the KFC App now!

Introducing Contactless Delivery, a new feature that allows you to receive your orders without direct contact with our riders.

Update your app and get more finger lickin’ goodness now!

We're constantly working hard to enhance your KFC App experience.

Improvement in this version:
Order your meals online when you're in store and pick it up with Self Collect. Enjoy contactless ordering, skip the queue, and go cashless!
Download or update your app now for more finger lickin' goodness!

We’re still open and still fryin’!

Our operating hours may differ in compliance with local authorities. Don’t worry, you can still order your favourite KFC meals through Delivery, or choose Self Collect and pick it up from your nearest KFC!

Update your app now for more finger lickin’ goodness!

Order ahead with Delivery and Self Collect to berbuka with your favourite KFC meals this Ramadan!
Update your app now and enjoy finger lickin’ good deals now.

Our restaurants are now open for dine-in! Launch the KFC App to find one near you today. Alternatively, you can get our finger lickin’ good meals delivered to you, or pick it up from your nearest KFC.
Download or update your app to enjoy our latest offers this Raya!

KFC YOU SOON
Come together, but not too close together-gether. Our dine-in service has reopened with social distancing measures in place, so look out for your nearest KFC on the app and come on over! Don't worry, you can still order your favourite KFC meals through Delivery, or choose Self Collect and pick it up from your nearest restaurant.

Update your app now for more finger lickin' goodness!

We're open and fryin' for dine-in! Look for your nearest KFC on the app and come on over. Alternatively, you can still get your favourite KFC meals through Delivery, or choose Self Collect and pick it up from your nearest restaurant.

Download or update your KFC app now and order away!

TAPAU MACAM BOSS WITH PANDU AMBIL
Introducing Pandu Ambil, the all-new way to Self Collect.
Simple je—just order online, park, and we'll hantar to your car.

Skip The Queue l Contactless Takeaway l Exclusive Deals

Download or update your KFC app to try it now!

We're constantly working hard to enhance your KFC App experience.
Introducing our latest feature for your convenience - Pandu Ambil!
Just order via Self Collect, select Pandu Ambil, park at our designated parking space, and we'll bring your order to you. Available nationwide at selected KFC restaurants.
Download or update your app now to order with this new feature.

Ordering your favourite chicken meals just got easier! Update the KFC app now to get access to even more payment options for a convenient and hassle-free checkout experience.
- Online banking - NEW!
- e-Wallet - NEW! (Boost, GrabPay, Touch 'n Go eWallet, Maybank QRPay, Razer Pay)
- Debit/Credit card
- Cash

BUCKETFUL FULL OF DEALS JUST FOR YOU

Get the hottest chicken deals all in one place, jom redeem yours today! Whether it's KFC Delivery or Self Collect, we've got deals just for you.

It's so easy - just tap on the % icon, select your deal and redeem.

Available exclusively on the KFC app. So hurry, download or update your KFC app now!
